tool_description:
The proprietary convolutional neural network collects and processes wide range of data sources to cover any location and consider the local nuances of climate.

We collect and process weather data from different sources such as global and local weather models, satellites, radars and vast network of weather stations.

For each point on the globe, RapidWeather provides historical, current and forecasted weather data via light-speed APIs.
name: RapidWeather
title: RapidWeather

api_list.name: Call 5 day / 3 hour forecast data - By city name
api_list.description: You can search weather forecast for 5 days with data every 3 hours by city name.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description:
City name, state code and country code divided by comma, use ISO 3166 country codes.
You can specify the parameter not only in English. In this case, the API response should be returned in the same language as the language of requested location name if the location is in our predefined list of more than 200,000 locations.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

optional_parameters.name: cnt
optional_parameters.description: A number of timestamps, which will be returned in the API response.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language

api_list.name: Call 5 day / 3 hour forecast data - By ZIP code
api_list.description: Please note if country is not specified then the search works for USA as a default.

optional_parameters.name: cnt
optional_parameters.description: A number of timestamps, which will be returned in the API response.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language.

api_list.name: Current air pollution data
api_list.description:
Current air pollution data.
Besides basic Air Quality Index, the API returns data about polluting gases, such as Carbon monoxide (CO), Nitrogen monoxide (NO), Nitrogen dioxide (NO2), Ozone (O3), Sulphur dioxide (SO2), Ammonia (NH3), and particulates (PM2.5 and PM10).

Air pollution forecast is available for 5 days with hourly granularity. Historical data is accessible from 27th November 2020.

api_list.name: Forecast air pollution data
api_list.description:
Forecast air pollution data.
Besides basic Air Quality Index, the API returns data about polluting gases, such as Carbon monoxide (CO), Nitrogen monoxide (NO), Nitrogen dioxide (NO2), Ozone (O3), Sulphur dioxide (SO2), Ammonia (NH3), and particulates (PM2.5 and PM10).

Air pollution forecast is available for 5 days with hourly granularity. Historical data is accessible from 27th November 2020.

api_list.name: Historical air pollution data

required_parameters.name: start
required_parameters.description: Start date (unix time, UTC time zone), e.g. start=1606488670

required_parameters.name: end
required_parameters.description: End date (unix time, UTC time zone), e.g. end=1606747870

api_list.name: Coordinates by location name

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: City name, state code (only for the US) and country code divided by comma. Please use ISO 3166 country codes.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of the locations in the API response (up to 5 results can be returned in the API response)

api_list.name: Reverse geocoding
api_list.description: Reverse geocoding allows to get name of the location (city name or area name) by using geografical coordinates (lat, lon). The **limit **parameter in the API call allows you to cap how many location names you will see in the API response.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of the location names in the API response (several results can be returned in the API response)

api_list.name: Coordinates by zip/post code

required_parameters.name: zip
required_parameters.description: Zip/post code and country code divided by comma. Please use ISO 3166 country codes

api_list.name: One Call API
api_list.description:
The One Call API provides the following weather data for any geographical coordinates:

- Current weather
- Minute forecast for 1 hour
- Hourly forecast for 48 hours
- Daily forecast for 7 days
- National weather alerts
- Historical weather data for the previous 5 days

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default

optional_parameters.name: exclude
optional_parameters.description:
By using this parameter you can exclude some parts of the weather data from the API response. It should be a comma-delimited list (without spaces).
Available values:

- current
- minutely
- hourly
- daily
- alerts

api_list.name: Call 5 day / 3 hour forecast data - By geographic coordinates
api_list.description: You can search weather forecast for 5 days with data every 3 hours by geographic coordinates.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language.

optional_parameters.name: cnt
optional_parameters.description: A number of timestamps, which will be returned in the API response.

api_list.name: Call 5 day / 3 hour forecast data - By city ID
api_list.description: You can search weather forecast for 5 days with data every 3 hours by city ID. We recommend to call API by city ID to get unambiguous result for your city.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language

optional_parameters.name: cnt
optional_parameters.description: A number of timestamps, which will be returned in the API response.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

api_list.name: Cities in circle
api_list.description: API returns data from cities laid within definite circle that is specified by center point

optional_parameters.name: cnt
optional_parameters.description: Number of cities around the point that should be returned. The default number of cities is 5, the maximum is 50.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

api_list.name: By ZIP code
api_list.description: Please note if country is not specified then the search works for USA as a default.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

api_list.name: By geographic coordinates

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language

api_list.name: By city ID
api_list.description:
You can make an API call by city ID.
We recommend to call API by city ID to get unambiguous result for your city.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language

api_list.name: By city name
api_list.description: You can call by city name or city name, state code and country code. Please note that searching by states available only for the USA locations.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description:
City name, state code and country code divided by comma, Please, refer to [ISO 3166](https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search) for the state codes or country codes.
You can specify the parameter not only in English. In this case, the API response should be returned in the same language as the language of requested location name if the location is in our predefined list of more than 200,000 locations.

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language

api_list.name: Previous 5 Days Historical Weather Data
api_list.description: Historical weather data for the previous 5 days

required_parameters.name: dt
required_parameters.description: Date from the previous five days (Unix time, UTC time zone), e.g. dt=1586468027

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: Units of measurement. **standard**, **metric **and **imperial **units are available. If you do not use the **units **parameter, **standard **units will be applied by default.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: You can use the **lang **parameter to get the output in your language
